subject: Baseball
Tests (Drug Use)
Steroids
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Ryan Braun, the N.L. Most Valuable Player in 2011 and one of baseball’s brightest young stars, reportedly tested positive for a performance-enhancing drug this fall.
snippet: Ryan Braun, the N.L. Most Valuable Player in 2011 and one of baseball’s brightest young stars, reportedly tested positive for a performance-enhancing drug this fall.
